EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Istanbul.
Event: Honeywell Operators Conference Date: April 16th, 2019 Location: Sheraton Istanbul Atakoy Hotel, Sahilyolu Cad, Atakoy, 34158, Istanbul
Please contact us at Jiri.Huml@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jiri.Huml@honeywell.com?subject=Honeywell Operators Forum - Istanbul]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event!
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
